column4: hey I got a bunch of cds in the mail but they were all 5.04 i'm downloading the ISO of the newest one but does 5.04 come with any program I can burn ISO's with?
nope you have to install it manually
whats the name of the program?
what program do I need to burn ISO's and where can I get it?
you can install it using synaptic
cause in order to install gnome-baker you need to enable repositories
any idea what section it would be in Whistler
no luck on gnome-baker but I see stuff like
you need to enable repositories first
thanks Whistler I'll be back with 5.10 in an hour
